subject: [junit] Order of execution for tests
msgSnippet: I have a scenario to test where in I need to make sure that tests are executed in particular order... How can I achieve this? Are the test cases added with
messageBody:
I have a scenario to test where in I need to make sure that tests are
executed in particular order...
How can I achieve this?

Are the test cases added with annotation @Test gets executed in the order
they are written?

Do test cases get executed randomly or do they follow any specific order?

-----

Regards,
Yogesh Patil.
